name: Desquarium
description:
Created in 10 days for Mundane Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) 

Add a little bit of color to your desktop with this virtual aquarium, and be rewarded with more fishy friends by caring for their home

Credits

Art and Programming by KassieKitsune and GreedyEve

KNOWN BUGS

- Cannot pick scrubber back up if put down near the centre of the tank, avoid this by leaving the scrubber along the edges of the tank
